entity.name: reference_book
entity.query: select 10 as priority, codebar, concat('reference_', id) as id, isbn, concat(formatted_author, ' ', title) as lookup_key, title, author, publisher, formatted_author, category, edition, year, pages from reference.publications

entity.name: legacy_book
entity.query: select 2 as priority, concat('legacy_', id) as id, isbn, concat(formatted_author, ' ', title) as lookup_key, title, author, publisher, formatted_author, category, edition, year, pages from legacy.publications
